Summary: walked outside seen bright light and got great photos that need analyzed i found 2 other crafts that couldnt be seen by naked eye or so i think
trends: There has been one other sighting in Erwin
There was one other sighting in Erwin on or around February 14th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside to my car to get my lighter and all the sudden I just so happens to look up and noticed this big bright light in the sky and my first thought was is that the north star and I looked around and found the north star and it was microscopic. compared to this object so I knew it was something odd and out of place so I yelled to my mother who was home at the time to go grab her digital camera and she did so I took a few photos and for some reason the object would wind up being a squiggly line on the camera and it didn't make amny sence because I was taking steady shots so it was almost like the object was moving so fast the camera couldn't keep up but the object was so far away it looked stationary so finally I got 3 to 4 great shots with the object perfectly im place and not moving so at this time mr and my mother still didn't know what it was or w hat we were looking so I decided to bring the photos inside and put the images on my playstation 3 so I could zoom in in it andbsee what it was and what I saw was a shape of an object that reminded be of a game called gallega that was popular years ago not the ship but one of the objects you would have to shoot at on this game so I got to looking even closer and I noticed a perfectly round black object that you couldn't see with the naked eye and I thought well maybe its the moon but it couldn't have been the moon because it was a clear night and the moon wouldn't be black and it was to small to be the moon and then I looked closer and noticed another black circle that I couldn't see unless I zoomed in in it and then I knew I had something that needed to be seriously looked at and studied and I never knew where to go or who to show but today I sej5en the name of your establishment om tv and
